value:
Like I said, I'm just a mercenary.
Not really the type to rub elbows
with any royalty around here.

People say I look mad all the time.
They can say what they want. If I
hear it, though? Then I get mad.

I have to give it to you. You fight
with brains, not brawn. Wish I
had the knack for that.

I have my reasons for fighting, and
for pushing myself to get stronger, and
for getting flexible with weapons.

I used to rely on a sword, but the
stronger I get, I think the axe
suits me better.

My business here is with
$Nu.$k$pThat you? I'm here on behalf of
someone else.

Power? Like this? You have my
thanks.

I'm Raven. Just a mercenary.
Nothing more to it.

It's nothing worth talking about, but
there's something I might as well
tell you, $Nu.$k$pA long time ago, I was from a
royal house—a house that was
destroyed by our enemies.$k$pThat was why I became a
mercenary—to seek revenge
on those who did it.$k$pI sought power—and always more
of it—to better exact my revenge.$k$pBut now, none of that matters.
I've come to my senses after
watching you at work here.$k$pDoes any of that make sense?
If not, forget I said anything.
I'll still fight hard for you.
I take it we're here to discuss something?
Is this touching stuff some sort of amusement?
Likes? Dislikes? Oh, I don't know. I like meat, I guess?
People say I scowl. Hmph. What do they know?
I'm not angry. This is just my face.
Glad to fight for you. Long as it doesn't get in the way of...well, never mind.
